code: import apiClient from'./client';class CompanyService{async getCompanies(){let page=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:0;let size=arguments.length>1&&arguments[1]!==undefined?arguments[1]:10;let search=arguments.length>2?arguments[2]:undefined;const params=new URLSearchParams({page:page.toString(),size:size.toString()});if(search){params.append('search',search);}const response=await apiClient.get("/companies?".concat(params));return response.data;}async getCompanyById(id){const response=await apiClient.get("/companies/".concat(id));return response.data;}async createCompany(companyData){const response=await apiClient.post('/companies',companyData);return response.data;}async updateCompany(id,companyData){const response=await apiClient.put("/companies/".concat(id),companyData);return response.data;}async deleteCompany(id){await apiClient.delete("/companies/".concat(id));}async activateCompany(id){const response=await apiClient.patch("/companies/".concat(id,"/activate"));return response.data;}async deactivateCompany(id){const response=await apiClient.patch("/companies/".concat(id,"/deactivate"));return response.data;}}const companyService=new CompanyService();export default companyService;
